text.p: Tropical Cyclone Daniella is becoming less of a threat to shipping in the South Indian Ocean. Centered near 24s/59e and moving southeast at 6 mph, this system has top winds of 35 mph and will continue to weaken and should dissipate within 36 hours.

Tropical Cyclone 09S is becoming an increasing threat to shipping in the South Indian Ocean. This storm, centered near 13s/86e, is moving west at 8 mph and will continue this track while intensifying this period.
THERE ARE NO FURTHER EMERGENCY STATEMENTS AT THIS TIME
